title: The State of COVID-19 Treatments
itunes:title: The State of COVID-19 Treatments
description:
Dr. Joanne Roberts, Chief Value Officer at Providence St. Joseph Health, provides a coronavirus update. She says COVID-19 is “a fire burning constantly.” Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Austin Carr discusses his story “‘Fyre Festival of Pizza’ Wasn’t Accused Fraudster’s First Flop.” We get Businessweek Economics with Bloomberg News Federal Reserve and U.S. Economy Reporter Chris Condon. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne shares his thoughts on Hong Kong’s new reality. And we Drive to the Close with Sam Dunlap, CIO of Public Strategies at Angel Oak Capital Advisors.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
